panels.description:
The methodology used to calculate your estimated emissions is based on the guiding principles on data sources and allocation methods outlined in the GHG Protocol and other relevant standards. For more information, see the methodology in [Understanding your Customer Carbon Footprint estimations](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/awsaccountbilling/latest/aboutv2/ccft-estimation.html?icmpid=docs_billing_hp-ccft-summary).

The emissions savings is the difference between the carbon footprint emissions calculated using the location-based method (LBM) and the market-based method (MBM).

options.content:
# Carbon emissions summary Info
Provides your total AWS carbon emissions and the estimated savings from using AWS. The savings represent the estimated carbon emission reduction due to AWS's carbon-free energy purchases. If your emissions are lower than your savings, it means AWS has purchased carbon-free energy that compensated all or part of the emissions associated with your usage.

# Data publishing time
Monthly carbon estimates are now published by the 23rd of the month after the usage occurs. For example, November carbon estimates are published by December 23rd.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  SUM(total_lbm_emissions_value) AS "Estimated LBM emissions",
  SUM(total_mbm_emissions_value) AS "Estimated MBM emissions",
  SUM(total_lbm_emissions_value - total_mbm_emissions_value) AS "Estimated emissions savings"
FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)

SELECT
  MAX(CAST(last_refresh_timestamp AS TIMESTAMP)) AS "Last Refresh Date",
  DATE_DIFF('day', MAX(CAST(last_refresh_timestamp AS TIMESTAMP)), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS "Days Since Refresh"
FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)

WITH RegionalTotals AS (
    SELECT
        usage_period_start AS time,
        location,
        SUM(total_mbm_emissions_value) AS emissions
    FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
    WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)
    GROUP BY 1, 2
),
RankedRegions AS (
    SELECT
        time,
        location,
        emissions,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY time ORDER BY emissions DESC) as rnk
    FROM RegionalTotals
)
SELECT
    time,
    CASE 
        WHEN rnk <= 5 THEN location 
        ELSE 'Other' 
    END AS metric,
    SUM(emissions) AS "Emissions (MTCO2e)"
FROM RankedRegions
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1 ASC

WITH RegionalTotals AS (
    SELECT
        usage_period_start AS time,
        location,
        SUM(total_lbm_emissions_value) AS emissions
    FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
    WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)
    GROUP BY 1, 2
),
RankedRegions AS (
    SELECT
        time,
        location,
        emissions,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY time ORDER BY emissions DESC) as rnk
    FROM RegionalTotals
)
SELECT
    time,
    CASE 
        WHEN rnk <= 5 THEN location 
        ELSE 'Other' 
    END AS metric,
    SUM(emissions) AS "Emissions (MTCO2e)"
FROM RankedRegions
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.description: The CCFT accounts for estimated emissions for the full range of AWS products. S3, EC2, and CloudFront emissions are broken down, while all other services are included in the 'Other' category.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  product_code AS "Service",
  SUM(total_mbm_emissions_value) AS "MTCO2e"
FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

panels.title: Emissions by Service (MBM)

panels.description: The CCFT accounts for estimated emissions for the full range of AWS products. S3, EC2, and CloudFront emissions are broken down, while all other services are included in the 'Other' category.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  product_code AS "Service",
  SUM(total_lbm_emissions_value) AS "MTCO2e"
FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

panels.title: Emissions by Service (LBM)

panels.description: The CCFT accounts for estimated emissions for the full range of AWS products. S3, EC2, and CloudFront emissions are broken down, while all other services are included in the 'Other' category.

targets.rawSQL:
WITH ServiceTotals AS (
    SELECT
        product_code AS "Service",
        SUM(total_mbm_emissions_value) AS mbm_val,
        SUM(total_lbm_emissions_value) AS lbm_val
    FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
    WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)
    GROUP BY 1
),
GrandTotals AS (
    SELECT
        "Service",
        mbm_val,
        lbm_val,
        -- Window function to get total across all rows
        SUM(mbm_val) OVER () as total_mbm,
        SUM(lbm_val) OVER () as total_lbm
    FROM ServiceTotals
)
SELECT
    "Service",
    -- MBM Columns
    ROUND(mbm_val, 3) AS "MBM carbon emissions",
    CONCAT(CAST(ROUND((mbm_val / NULLIF(total_mbm, 0)) * 100, 1) AS VARCHAR), '%') AS "% of total emissions (MBM)",
    -- LBM Columns
    ROUND(lbm_val, 3) AS "LBM carbon emissions",
    CONCAT(CAST(ROUND((lbm_val / NULLIF(total_lbm, 0)) * 100, 1) AS VARCHAR), '%') AS "% of total emissions (LBM)"
FROM GrandTotals
ORDER BY mbm_val DESC

panels.title: Emissions by Service

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  SUM(total_scope_1_emissions_value) AS "Scope 1 (Direct)",
  SUM(total_scope_2_mbm_emissions_value) AS "Scope 2 (Electricity)",
  SUM(total_scope_3_mbm_emissions_value) AS "Scope 3 (Supply Chain)"
FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)

SELECT
  SUM(total_scope_1_emissions_value) AS "Scope 1 (Direct)",
  SUM(total_scope_2_Lbm_emissions_value) AS "Scope 2 (Electricity)",
  SUM(total_scope_3_Lbm_emissions_value) AS "Scope 3 (Supply Chain)"
FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)

panels.description:
This table displays emissions by AWS Region. Emissions from Global Services, such as Amazon CloudFront, are reported under Global.

* **LBM (Location-Based)**: Shows the "physical" reality of the local power grid where your servers are running.

* **MBM (Market-Based)**: Shows your footprint after accounting for AWS's renewable energy purchases. Comparing these two in one table helps you see exactly where AWSâ€™s green energy investments are having the most impact on your specific workload.

targets.rawSQL:
WITH RegionalTotals AS (
    SELECT
        location AS "Region",
        SUM(total_mbm_emissions_value) AS mbm_val,
        SUM(total_lbm_emissions_value) AS lbm_val
    FROM "carbonreportgrafana"."data"
    WHERE $__timeFilter(usage_period_start)
    GROUP BY 1
),
GrandTotals AS (
    SELECT
        "Region",
        mbm_val,
        lbm_val,
        -- Calculate total across all regions for percentage denominators
        SUM(mbm_val) OVER () as total_mbm,
        SUM(lbm_val) OVER () as total_lbm
    FROM RegionalTotals
)
SELECT
    "Region",
    -- MBM Columns
    ROUND(mbm_val, 3) AS "MBM carbon emissions",
    CASE 
        WHEN total_mbm > 0 THEN CONCAT(CAST(ROUND((mbm_val / total_mbm) * 100, 1) AS VARCHAR), '%')
        ELSE '0%' 
    END AS "% of total emissions (MBM)",
    -- LBM Columns
    ROUND(lbm_val, 3) AS "LBM carbon emissions",
    CASE 
        WHEN total_lbm > 0 THEN CONCAT(CAST(ROUND((lbm_val / total_lbm) * 100, 1) AS VARCHAR), '%')
        ELSE '0%' 
    END AS "% of total emissions (LBM)"
FROM GrandTotals
ORDER BY mbm_val DESC

panels.title: Emissions by AWS Region

options.content:
# AWS Table Data

| Column name                       | Data type | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| --------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| last_refresh_timestamp            | Timestamp | The time when the carbon footprint value was last generated, in UTC. The format is YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| location                          | String    | Describes the human-readable location where the usage originated from, corresponding to the region_code. For example, US East (N. Virginia). Emissions from Global Services, such as Amazon CloudFront, are reported under Global.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| model_version                     | String    | The version of the methodology the carbon footprint data was calculated with. For example, v2.0.0.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| payer_account_id                  | String    | The account ID of the paying account. For an organization in AWS Organizations, this is the account ID of the management account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| product_code                      | String    | The code of the product measured. For example, Amazon EC2 is the product code for Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| region_code                       | String    | A Region is a physical location around the world where data centers are clustered. AWS calls each group of logical data centers an Availability Zone (AZ). Each AWS Region consists of multiple, isolated, and physically separate AZs within a geographical area. The Region code attribute has the same name as an AWS Region, and specifies where the AWS service is available. For example, us-east-1. |
| total_lbm_emissions_unit          | String    | The unit of measure used for location-based method (LBM) emissions. The unit we currently support is metric tons of carbon dioxide-equivalent (MTCO2e).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| total_lbm_emissions_value         | Double    | The total estimated location-based method (LBM) emissions value associated with the account, including Scope 1, Scope 2, and Scope 3.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| total_mbm_emissions_unit          | String    | The unit of measure used for market-based method (MBM) emissions. The unit we currently support is metric tons of carbon dioxide-equivalent (MTCO2e).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| total_mbm_emissions_value         | Double    | The total estimated market-based method (MBM) emissions value associated with the account, including Scope 1, Scope 2, and Scope 3.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| total_scope_1_emissions_unit      | String    | The unit of measure used for Scope 1 emissions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| total_scope_1_emissions_value     | Double    | The Scope 1 emissions value associated with the account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| total_scope_2_lbm_emissions_unit  | String    | The unit of measure used for Scope 2 location-based method (LBM) emissions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| total_scope_2_lbm_emissions_value | Double    | The Scope 2 location-based method (LBM) emissions value associated with the account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| total_scope_2_mbm_emissions_unit  | String    | The unit of measure used for Scope 2 market-based method (MBM) emissions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| total_scope_2_mbm_emissions_value | Double    | The Scope 2 market-based method (MBM) emissions value associated with the account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| total_scope_3_lbm_emissions_unit  | String    | The unit of measure used for Scope 3 location-based method (LBM) emissions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| total_scope_3_lbm_emissions_value | Double    | The Scope 3 location-based method (LBM) emissions value associated with the account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| total_scope_3_mbm_emissions_unit  | String    | The unit of measure used for Scope 3 market-based method (MBM) emissions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| total_scope_3_mbm_emissions_value | Double    | The Scope 3 market-based method (MBM) emissions value associated with the account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| usage_account_id                  | String    | The account ID of the account associated with the carbon footprint value. For organizations, this can be either the management account or a member account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| usage_period_end                  | Timestamp | The end date of the period that is covered by this report, in UTC. The format is YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| usage_period_start                | Timestamp | The start date of the period that is covered by this report, in UTC. The format is YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
